value.title: Calculating Stock on Hand Using DAX   Power BI Inventory Model

Even if you want to build such a table, it can get easily gigantic. In this video, I am going to show you how you can use DAX

value.title: Combining Tables in Power BI   Union Except and Intersect in DAX

An example of that is when you want to create that combination only virtually as part of a measure calculation that evaluates dynamically.
